author: Lesley Waters
method: In a medium saucepan on a high heat melt the butter and sugar and add the greengages, cinnamon and the vanilla pod. Simmer for four minutes on a low heat. In a knickerbocker glory glass add some of the stewed greengages, then add a scoop of vanilla ice cream.  Repeat this process until the glass is full. To finish sprinkle the nuts, the chocolate and the oats on top.
ingredients: 25g/1oz butter,  25g/1oz brown sugar,  100g/3½oz greengages,  ½oz tsp cinnamon,  ½oz vanilla pod,  3 scoops of vanilla ice cream,  25g/1oz almonds, toasted ,  25g/1oz chocolate, grated ,  25g/1oz oats, toasted
